name: Women Oversized Striped Color Block Long Sleeve Crew Neck Sweatshirt Casual Loose Pullover Y2K Shirt Top

title: Just ok.
content: I had to laugh the second I put this on my husband said I looked like a piece of fruit stripe gum. I will admit it was cuter in the picture. I plan to keep it but may just use it to lounge around the house. Oversized fit for sure.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have two free people ones and I like this one better ! Buy it
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2024

title: Love this!
content: The shirt is exactly as pictured, which I appreciate. Visually it is very close to the FP top, but the quality and structure isn’t even in the same ballpark (I have both this and the Free People one). This one is heavier, doesn’t drape effortlessly, isn’t super soft, and the bottom is more cinched (even with it being oversized). If you’re looking to get this purely as a dupe, this is fine enough but couldn’t pass as the “real thing”. Obviously the prices between the original and this are vastly different, but if you really love this style and can swing the FP price tag, I’d 100% recommend the original. If you’re just looking for an oversized long-sleeve, and like the stripes/colors, then this is a good top.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I love my sweatshirt, but I put in on low in the dryer and the oversize fit went away after I dried it. I wished I had just line dried. The sleeves and overall length shrunk. I still wear it, but if I get it in another color I will not machine dry.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2024

title: Super Cute and Comfortable
content: The color and fit of these are just as advertised. I think they’re a little expensive for the type of material it was. I thought it would be a more smooth cotton, but it’s not. Everyone will know what I’m talking about, but the color does look like advertised and fit is slouchy ( nice ) but the fabric is awful ( why can’t they get real cotton clothes like we used to but not all these cheap fabrics - what’s happened- the fabric quality is horrible- as is everything since Covid ( pay more and get less

title: Verified Purchase
content: This is so cute & comfy! However, I feel like I have short to regular length arms/torso and it barely comes to my wrists/waist. My hair ties and bracelets stick out perfect for me- but if you have longer arms or torso, size up at least 1 size. I run between a medium and a large. I do tend to like my clothes looser than tighter so I went w a large and it fits perfect for my petite body. SUCH FUN VIBRANT COLORS. the one (pleasant but strange) thing I am sketched out is that is has the best perfume scent on it!? so strange but delightful lol.. would absolutely buy again.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2024

title: Fits better than the FP original
content: I can’t get enough of this sweater! The sweater is very similar to the original, the only caveat is that it’s not as high of quality - but after all it is a dupe for a fraction of the price. The material is soft made from mostly cotton so it’s comfortable to wear. It holds up nicely in the wash - I suggest tap cold and laying flat to dry to ensure longevity.

title: Verified Purchase
